item.title: Return Migration
item.description: Return Migration also see return vs return migration diasporic returns tsuda ’s ethnic return migration [[christou and king]]’s [[counter-diasporic migration]] Wessendorf Authors tsuda christou and king nguyen-akbar mytoan chan and tran Literature #readme: [[005.Authors/jain]], Sonal’s For love and money: second-generation Indian-Americans ‘return’ to India christou and king Cultural geographies of counter-diasporic migration: perspectives from the study of second-generation ‘returnees’ to Greece maintaining strong canadian identity in hong kong Return Migrant or Diaspora: An Exploratory Study of New-Generation Chinese–Canadian Youth Working in Hong Kong 2nd gen highly skilled in carrcaribbean ‘Young, gifted and back’: second-generation transnational return migrants to the Caribbean gendered experience “Leftover Women” and “Kings of the Candy Shop”: Gendering Chinese American Ancestral Homeland Migration to China 2nd gens to greece and #integration Second-generation “return” to Greece: new dynamics of transnationalism and integration already read
